body: So recently my internet has been shit, but my ping is normally ok regarding cs go and other games. But when i play mc or try to go on avicus. I suddenly start getting huge ping spikes. I thought it would stop, but it hasn't. Any suggestions?
body_tagged: So recently my internet has been shit, but my ping is normally ok regarding cs go and other games. But when i play mc or try to go on avicus. I suddenly start getting huge ping spikes. I thought it would stop, but it hasn't. Any suggestions?
title: Minecraft Lag Spikes

replies.body:
Restart Internet
Restart connection to PC/laptop
Restart PC/laptop
Restart Minecraft
replies.body_tagged:
Restart Internet
Restart connection to PC/laptop
Restart PC/laptop
Restart Minecraft

replies.body: Might be something you're doing in the meanwhile, like programs in the background or music.
replies.body_tagged: Might be something you're doing in the meanwhile, like programs in the background or music.

replies.body: When you play cs go, you don't play Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: When you play cs go, you don't play Minecraft.
